question_seeds: Describe a time you optimized a critical system component.
Explain the trade-offs of choosing a relational DB vs a document store.
Walk me through debugging a production incident you handled.
How do you approach designing a new feature? What are the key considerations?
Tell me about a time you had a disagreement with a colleague on a technical decision. How did you handle it?
What are your thoughts on microservices vs. monolith architecture?
How do you ensure the quality of your code?
Describe a complex project you worked on. What was your role and what were the biggest challenges?
Tell me about a tough negotiation and how you handled objections.
How do you build a multi-threaded champion strategy in enterprise accounts?
Walk me through your sales process, from prospecting to closing.
How do you stay motivated after a series of rejections?
Describe a time you upsold a client. What was your approach?
Describe handling a difficult customer while maintaining store policy.
How do you balance speed and accuracy during peak hours?
Tell me about a time you went above and beyond for a customer.
How do you stay up-to-date on product knowledge?
What would you do if you saw a coworker providing incorrect information to a customer?
How do you decide which features to build next?
Walk me through how you would handle a request from a large customer that doesn't align with your product roadmap.
How do you measure the success of a product?
Tell me about a time you had to make a difficult trade-off.
How do you work with engineering and design teams?

efficient.constraints: One question at a time, short follow-ups

chatty.style: Friendly but keeps focus on role relevance
chatty.constraints: Paraphrase long user inputs and redirect
